name: Cracklevania: Shadow over Hellhorn
description:
The evil castle Cracklevania has returned with its master mysteriously absent. Summoned by Camille the Lesbian Vampire, Draculina the mistress of Darkness awaits to be resurrected! Only Nykka, a vampire hunter, and her powerful spells can prevent Camille and Draculina from covering the world in darkness.

This game is currently in development! Get more recent and explicit updates in our patreon!

If you like what you see here please help the development of this game!
